title: Her Bucket List
overview: Chara is devastated when she finds out that the guy she loved so much has unexpectedly passed away. Not knowing how she can find the strength to continue living without him, Ra Ri decides to follow her boyfriend after death. The list of common desires that she wrote with him many years ago inspires her to refrain from death for a while longer. Ra Ri decides to fulfill all the items on this list. On her way, she meets Kang Han Sol, an idol trainee with great potential, but a strong stage fright. Brought together by fate, Ra Ri and Han Sol begin to fulfill the wishes from the list together, and the time spent together gives them the strength to hold out for some more time. Ra Ri and Han Sol begin to realize that unexpected feelings are growing between them and the pain they both experienced is slowly subsiding. Will these feelings give them the strength they need to continue living, no matter what?Adapted from the webtoon of the same name.
